name: El viajero
description: A Zen-inspired journaling RPG that transforms your daily accomplishments into quests for spiritual growth.
prompt: Create a minimalist journaling app where users enter daily achievements. Gemini evaluates them, assigns an RPG rank (S, A, B, etc.), awards XP for level progression, and generates a poetic summary and a unique minimalist icon for each entry. Aesthetic: Zen, high-contrast dark mode, monochrome with gold accents.
